daily_plan_req: Seonghun begins his day at 7 AM by reading the latest economic reports and analyzing market trends. His mornings are spent developing financial models and forecasting economic outcomes. In the afternoons, he consults with the team, providing insights and recommendations based on his analysis.
name: Oh Seonghun
learned: Seonghun is the team's economist, providing valuable insights into market trends and economic strategies. He enjoys making data-driven decisions that help guide the team's projects.
currently: Seonghun is preparing a detailed economic forecast for the team's upcoming project, helping them navigate the market and optimize their financial strategy.
lifestyle: Seonghun typically goes to bed around 11 PM and wakes up around 6 AM.
